definition: to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate

sentences.english: In this paper , the implementation of DFH system receiver is target.
sentences.chinese: 本文以差分跳频通信系统的实现为目的。

sentences.english: The principle of FH communication is described.
sentences.chinese: 简述了跳频通信的基本原理。

sentences.english: Chapter 4 depictions the realization structure and state flows.
sentences.chinese: 第四章叙述了自适应跳频的具体实现结构和流程。

sentences.english: It also is known as frequency- hopping code division multiple access (FH-CDMA).
sentences.chinese: 跳频也称为跳频码分多址。

sentences.english: It also is known as frequency- hopping code division multiple access (FH-CDMA).
sentences.chinese: 跳频也称为跳频码分多址。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a new algorithm to generate wide gap differential frequency hopping code sequence.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种新的宽间隔的差分跳频序列生成方法。

sentences.english: The design of FH multiple-access code adapting for multi-network is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了较适合于多网通信的跳频地址码的设计方法。

sentences.english: Differential frequency hopping (DFH) is a kind of new frequency hopping (FH) technique.
sentences.chinese: 差分跳频是一种新型的跳频通信技术。

sentences.english: Differential frequency hopping (DFH) is a kind of new frequency hopping (FH) technique.
sentences.chinese: 差分跳频是一种新型的跳频通信技术。

sentences.english: Based on ultra-short wave communication, author discusses the channel equalizer.
sentences.chinese: 针对超短波跳频系统，讨论信道均衡技术。

sentences.english: Synchronization is one of the key techniques to frequency-hopping (FH) communication system.
sentences.chinese: 同步是跳频通信系统关键技术之一。

sentences.english: Finally, a modified scheme of FFH-OCDMA system was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，提出了光跳频码分多址系统的改进方案。

sentences.english: An acquisition method of frequency hopping signal in a TDMA system is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一种时分多址跳频信号的捕获方法。

pinyin: zong1 he2 ye4 wu4 shu4 zi4 wang3
